name: Cute Chess
description:
Cute Chess is all the fun of regular chess but with cute little characters, scene designs and music to make the game even more fun.

Improve your chess skills by practising against computers with a range of different difficulties or take your skills online and compete against friends.

Features
- Single players vs computer with many different levels of ai difficulty
- Play online against friends or locally at the same computer
- Choose between playing with cute characters or a standard set of chess pieces
- Choose between multiple scenes to play in, each with their own cute and fun music
